For those that dont know (probably the vast majority of non Canadians) the World Junior Hockey Tournie is currently being held in North Dakota.
 
 During thursday's game the announcer stated that in 2 games played by the Canadian team more beer had been sold in 2 years at the stadium, (many Canadian spectators) and that on Sunday they had to send out for an emergency shipment of beer. 
 
 It made the announcer proud to be a Canadian (tongue in cheek comment)
Well cheers to the Canadians. Beer makes you a jolly good fellow, you know.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Canadian Beer Drinking Hockey Fans
